simula an algol base simul languag thi paper is anintroduct to simula a program languag design to provid asystem analyst with unifi concept which facilit the concis descriptof discret event system a system descript also serv asa sourc languag simul program simula is an extens ofalgol 60 in which the most import new concept isthat of quasi parallel process cacm septemb 1966 dahl oj nygaard k ca660907 jb march 2 1978 6 21pm 1024 4 1380 1051 4 1380 1086 4 13801098 4 1380 1132 4 1380 1214 4 1380 12344 1380 1263 4 1380 1265 4 1380 1270 41380 1323 4 1380 1323 4 1380 1358 4 13801358 4 1380 1379 4 1380 1380 4 1380 13804 1380 1380 4 1380 1380 4 1380 1388 41380 1393 4 1380 1453 4 1380 1464 4 13801484 4 1380 1485 4 1380 1487 4 1380 14914 1380 1498 4 1380 1549 4 1380 1552 41380 1570 4 1380 1613 4 1380 1614 4 13801665 4 1380 1693 4 1380 1781 4 1380 17814 1380 1781 4 1380 1787 4 1380 1825 41380 1854 4 1380 1860 4 1380 1860 4 13801878 4 1380 1946 4 1380 1957 4 1380 19894 1380 2060 4 1380 2083 4 1380 2112 41380 2168 4 1380 2178 4 1380 2179 4 13802252 4 1380 2325 4 1380 2341 4 1380 25344 1380 2541 4 1380 2546 4 1380 2645 41380 2652 4 1380 2684 4 1380 2698 4 13802723 4 1380 2733 4 1380 2820 4 1380 28424 1380 2857 4 1380 2929 4 1380 2934 41380 557 4 1380 3069 4 1380 3073 4 13803112 4 1380 3155 4 1380 669 4 1380 6794 1380 691 4 1380 761 4 1380 949 41380 989 4 1380 1380 5 1380 1380 5 13801380 5 1380 1421 5 1380 1541 5 1380 18465 1380 2060 5 1380 2218 5 1380 3112 51380 3184 5 1380 731 5 1380 799 5 1380106 6 1380 1358 6 1380 1380 6 1380 13806 1380 1380 6 1380 1380 6 1380 1380 61380 1421 6 1380 1424 6 1380 1469 6 13801477 6 1380 1484 6 1380 1491 6 1380 15726 1380 1572 6 1380 1728 6 1380 1751 61380 1752 6 1380 1810 6 1380 1826 6 1380210 6 1380 1869 6 1380 1879 6 1380 19726 1380 2095 6 1380 2110 6 1380 2438 61380 2723 6 1380 2736 6 1380 2833 6 13802838 6 1380 576 6 1380 731 6 1380
